title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for February 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for February 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for February 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for February 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of February 2025. We will also provide answers to all of the standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily after the episode airs, so you check back throughout the month to find the latest solutions. The episodes from February 10 to February 14, 2025 don’t seem to be tied to any particular theme. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Nelson Lopez, Tee Wallace, Jenna Henry. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for February 13. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, February 13, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – PRIM AND PROPER [Phrase] Tossup #1 – INITIATION FEE [Thing] Tossup #2 – ARCHAEOLOGIST [Occupation] Regular Puzzle #1 – MY HEART STOPS WHEN YOU LOOK AT ME [Song Lyrics] Regular Puzzle #2 – TAX RETURN OF THE JEDI [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS [On The Map] Tossup #3 – FALLING TO PIECES [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – FALLING ASLEEP [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – FALLING IN LOVE [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – YOU CAN SAY THAT AGAIN [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #5 – SLICED CUCUMBERS [Food & Drink] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, February 12: Bonus Round Puzzle – GIVING SOMEONE A HUG [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – FAITHFUL FANS [People] Tossup #2 -VENOM: THE LAST DANCE [Movie Title] Regular Puzzle #1 – COFFEE, CARROT & COCONUT CAKE [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – THERE’S ONLY WAY TO FIND OUT [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #3 – CHARMING COASTAL TOWNS [Places] Tossup #3 – HORSEPOWER [Thing] Tossup #4 – HORSESHOE [Thing] Tossup #5 – CHARLEY HORSE [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – WALK THIS WAY, TALK THIS WAY [Song Lyrics] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the February 14 episode. If you tune in weeknights from February 14 to February 21, you will have a six chances to win an epic Expedition Cruise as part of the Wheel Watchers Club.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of February 2025. We will also provide answers to all of the standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily after the episode airs, so you check back throughout the month to find the latest solutions.

The episodes from February 10 to February 14, 2025 don’t seem to be tied to any particular theme. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Nelson Lopez, Tee Wallace, Jenna Henry. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for February 13.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, February 13, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – PRIM AND PROPER [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – INITIATION FEE [Thing]
  • Tossup #2 – ARCHAEOLOGIST [Occupation]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MY HEART STOPS WHEN YOU LOOK AT ME [Song Lyrics]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TAX RETURN OF THE JEDI [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS [On The Map]
  • Tossup #3 – FALLING TO PIECES [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – FALLING ASLEEP [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – FALLING IN LOVE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – YOU CAN SAY THAT AGAIN [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #5 – SLICED CUCUMBERS [Food & Drink]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, February 12:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GIVING SOMEONE A HUG [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – FAITHFUL FANS [People]
  • Tossup #2 -VENOM: THE LAST DANCE [Movie Title]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – COFFEE, CARROT & COCONUT CAKE [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – THERE’S ONLY WAY TO FIND OUT [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – CHARMING COASTAL TOWNS [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – HORSEPOWER [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – HORSESHOE [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – CHARLEY HORSE [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – WALK THIS WAY, TALK THIS WAY [Song Lyrics]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the February 14 episode.

If you tune in weeknights from February 14 to February 21, you will have a six chances to win an epic Expedition Cruise as part of the Wheel Watchers Club.
